interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Snow Queen & Hogfather - Miniseries Double Feature
Review Date: 2016/02/22
Store: Bridget Fonda  (Actor),     Sir David Jason  (Actor),     Various  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    G    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Welcome To The Whimsical World Of Fantasy Adventure!', 'Magical, colorful and terrifically twisting; these TV Miniseries keep in the tradition of', '10th Kingdom', 'and', 'Tin Man', '! Packed with mythical mystery and popular characters your family will be delightfully entertained with enchantment!', 'Snow Queen', '(2002) Color', 'Starring Bridget Fonda, Jeremy Guilbaut, Chelsea Hobbs', 'Once A Year She Rises. For One Season She Reigns.', "Since a bitter winter storm stole the life of Gerda's mother, she and her father have sadly continued to run the remote hotel they call home. Lonely and isolated, Gerda's only joy is Kai, the handsome bellboy. A mysterious guest with an icy stare arrives at the hotel one night, wrapped in fur and diamonds. By daybreak, the Snow Queen, has vanished with Kai! Gerda embarks on a journey of morphing seasons, fantastical creatures and long-frozen mysteries in a desperate quest to find her stolen love.", 'Hogfather', '(2006) Color', 'Starring David Jason, Marc Warren, Michelle Dockery', 'Expect The Unexpected', 'From the imagination of best-selling author Terry Pratchett comes', 'Hogfather', ", a magical and witty tale unlike anything you've seen before. It's the holiday of Hogswatch in the parallel universe of Discworld, the night when kids anticipate presents from the beloved Hogfather. But someone - or something - wants the Hogfather out of the way. Now it's up to the most unlikely of heroes to get the holiday back on track before humanity loses all hope.", 'Review', 'Wonderful Family Fun…In A Fabulous Fantasy Adventure --Hogfather - Daily Mirror']
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Genre': "Children's", 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Bridget Fonda, Sir David Jason, Joss Ackland, Michelle Dockery, Various, Jeremy Guilbaut', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '2', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '6 hours and 9 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 15, 2013', 'Actors': 'Bridget Fonda, Sir David Jason, Jeremy Guilbaut, Michelle Dockery, Joss Ackland', 'Studio': 'Mill Creek Ent', 'Number of discs': '2'}
Review Text: have not watched snow queen - but hogfather is wonderful, and i'm so glad i own it now.  still a bit confused as to why this set was cheaper than buying hogfather alone, but i'll take it.
Review Title: bought for hogfather.  great movie!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Christmas Time in South Park Matt Stone (Director), Trey Parker (Director) Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Holidays & Seasonal, Christmas, Comedy ['There\'s no better time of the year than Christmas, especially in South Park. So stop fighting with the family, gather \'round the fire and watch these classic South Park episodes. Join in as the citizens of South Park sing many of everyone\'s favorite holiday classics, like "Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo" and "Christmas Time in Hell." See the boys bring Christmas to Iraq and learn how hard it is to be a Jew during this holiday season. Christmas is a time when we all can put aside out differences and agree on what the holidays are really about: presents! a Very Crappy Christmas, Mr. Hankey the Christmas Poo, Merry Christmas Charlie Manson!, Mr. Hankey\'s Christmas Classics, Red Sleigh Down, It\'s Christmas in Canada, Woodland Critter Christmas.'] {'Genre': 'Comedy/Television, Animation/Television', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Full Screen, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Color', 'Contributor': 'Trey Parker, Matt Stone', 'Language': 'Unqualified (DTS ES 6.1), English (Dolby Digital 2.0 Stereo)', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 34 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2517', 'Director': 'Matt Stone, Trey Parker', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Animated, Full Screen, Closed-captioned, NTSC, Color', 'Run time': '2 hours and 34 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 13, 2007', 'Studio': 'Comedy Central', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} finally caved and bought it when netflix took it off of instant and the wait was just a mess this year.

profile:
User Profile Summary:

The user continues to exhibit a strong affinity for comedic and animated content, particularly those with a holiday theme, aligning with their previous engagements with seasonal entertainment. Their latest purchase reinforces a consistent pattern of seeking out unique and whimsical narratives, blending fantasy and humor, while still catering to broader audiences. This suggests a willingness to explore complementary genres that maintain a light-hearted yet engaging tone.

Their proactive approach to curating their entertainment library reflects a desire for accessibility to beloved titles, further emphasized by their focus on high-quality viewing experiences as shown in their thoughtful reviews and high ratings. The user values stories that are not only entertaining but also immersive, demonstrating an appreciation for rich storytelling across varying genres.

Moreover, their continued interest in family-friendly, fantastical adventures indicates a balance in their taste, as they remain open to content that fosters communal enjoyment, especially during holidays. The user typically gravitates towards content that is playful and entertaining, with an appreciation for cleverly constructed narratives, reaffirming their inclination for sophisticated humor in a family-friendly format. Overall, the user's preferences illustrate a blend of whimsical and comedic themes, enhancing their seasonal viewing experiences.
